name: Free VPN
summary: Free VPN that enumerates and disables competing proxy extensions. Proxy server list fetched from Google Drive URL allowing operator to redirect all traffic without update. Ad network bypass list ensures ads served directly. Contains unused but initialized RSA encryption key, phishing URL set, and form state tracking.

vulnerabilities.title: Extension Enumeration and Disabling
vulnerabilities.description: Uses chrome.management.getAll() to enumerate all extensions with proxy permission and chrome.management.setEnabled() to disable them.

vulnerabilities.title: Dynamic Server Configuration from Google Drive
vulnerabilities.description: Proxy server list fetched from Google Drive URL, allowing operator to redirect all user traffic at any time without extension update.

flags.description: Enumerates and disables competing proxy extensions via chrome.management API
Proxy server list fetched from Google Drive allowing dynamic traffic redirection
